title: Sample IELTS Reading Test 1
passage: Coffee is believed to have originated in Ethiopia, where it was first discovered by a goat herder. It then spread to the Arabian Peninsula and gained popularity in the Middle East. By the 17th century, coffeehouses had become common in Europe. Today, coffee culture continues to evolve, with specialty blends and cafés found around the world.

questions.question: Coffee was first discovered in South America.
Which region was the first to cultivate coffee?
Coffee spread to the Arabian Peninsula and then to ____.
Match each century with a development in coffee history.
